text: Davi Samuel Alcolumbre Tobelem (born 19 June 1977) is a Brazilian politician. He was the President of the Senate of Brazil from 2019 until 2021. He has been a Senator, representing the state of Amapá, since 2015. He is a member of the Democrats. In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Alcolumbre had tested positive for COVID-19. ==References== ==Other websites== * Davi Alcolumbre’s official Senate profile Category:Living people Category:1977 births Category:Presidents of the Federal Senate Category:Democrats (Brazil) politicians Category:Amapá
title: Davi Alcolumbre
